forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning turning to all snow for the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain mixing with and changing to snow for the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. About one inch of snow expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low near -5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered overnight. Low 26F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 24F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 66F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 65F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 66F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
